thread.title: India's end-December external debt at $513.4 billion

title: India's end-December external debt at $513.4 billion
text:
March 28, 2018 / 12:17 PM / Updated 7 minutes ago India's end-December external debt at $513.4 billion Reuters Staff 1   India’s end-December external debt was $513.4 billion, up 3.6 percent from end-September, the finance ministry said in a statement on Wednesday. An employee counts Indian rupee currency notes inside a private money exchange office in New Delhi July 5, 2013. REUTERS/Adnan Abidi/Files 
On a residual maturity basis, short-term debt constituted 42.4 percent of total external debt at the end of December, slightly up from end-September’s 41.7 percent, the statement showed. Reporting by Suvashree Dey Choudhury; Editing by Amrutha Gayathri
